response.overview: This short documentary presents an overview of the events that took place in the port city of Mariupol in south-eastern Ukraine in the summer of 2014. The story of liberation of Mariupol on 13th June, 2014, is told by participants of operation - from a regular soldier to President of Ukraine.
response.title: Рік визволення. Маріуполь після «ДНР»
